content: l l d ittle arkspur esigns effortless earwarmer cozy fun simple ©2022 little larkspur designs ● effortless earwarmer ● all rights reserved skill level beginner method knit in the round from the bottom up supplies stitch marker us 13 / 9mm 16 circular knitting needles super bulky yarn weight 6 malabrigo rasta but any weight 6 yarn is fine if you meet gauge approximately 35 yards gauge 10 stitches x 16 rounds = 4x4 in stockinette in the round on size us 13 / 9mm needles note it is important to obtain gauge for the ear warmer to fit properly certain yarns can alter gauge for instance you may have to add additional rounds or cast on additional stitches if using lion brand thick & quick as it s a lighter weight 6 yarn whereas we are knitters the wool or sugar bush chill are bulkier weight 6 yarns so you may have to subtract rounds or cast on fewer stitches size fit & finished measurements adult/teen 8 5 wide x 4 25 tall 20-22 circumference to alter the fit increase/decrease needle size for a slightly larger/smaller ear warmer increase or decrease an even number of stitches you cast on depending on how you wish to alter the circumference note changes will affect yardage legend/abbreviations co cast on k knit p purl * repeat st s stitch es pm place marker r rds round rounds pattern using the long-tail cast on method loosely co 42 sts pm and join in the round be careful not to twist stitches rds 1-2 *k1 p1* until end of round now knit until ear warmer measures approx 3 25 from co edge or until desired height repeat rds 1-2 these are the final two rounds of ribbing before binding off bind off loosely just a regular bind off for a slightly stretchier bind off do a *k1 p1* bind off cut yarn and weave in loose ends congratulations on completing your
